data.text: @erikaherzog Thanks. That’s why I avoided taking anything for the aches until Sunday night. I felt mostly back to normal Monday afternoon though I have been more tired than usual this week. Good luck on your second dose. I am an outlier compared to most people I know that have had both doses
@lcwallace I’m so sorry. Yikes! I think if you have a reaction it means the vaccine works - if that’s any comfort. Hope you feel better soon!

@erikaherzog My headache started within an hour of the shot and is just now starting to go away 45 hrs later. I had every possible symptom (aches, fatigue, nausea, etc) yesterday all day and my fever stayed around 101. Head still feels kinda loopy today. Most I know had much milder symptoms.
@lcwallace Oh no! I’m bracing for that vaccine flu experience. I hear 36 hours and it’s over, maybe?
@erikaherzog Got my second dose yesterday morning and it’s kicking my butt
